Description.Name: Storage Space
Description.Details: Reduces the monthly upkeep of all stored inventory items by 5%. This includes equipment, weapons, salvaged 'Mechs and stored 'Mechs. Automating the Argo's internal storage is the future. One last upgrade to the storage cells would let us move to an automated drone inventory system with a few pressurised WorkMechs for special work. Depressurising some of our inventory and making robots do the work will save us a lot of upkeep by letting us assign the labour and resources elsewhere

AssignedCastDescription: I'm not suggesting that we have robots take everyone's jobs, but it's a fact that machines don't sleep, breathe, eat or complain. Some of our guys could strive to be a little more like that every now and again.
